name: Lab Escape (itch) (simonstired)
description:
WASD to Move. Mouse to Shoot.

Lab escape is a twin-stick shooter action-adventure game. A top-down 2D game where you play as a scientist who created an AI too powerful and now robots have gone rogue in his lab. The goal of the game will be to reach the generator in your lab at the end of the last level in order to turn the power off and regain control. To do so, the player will need to traverse all the levels in order while fighting off the rogue robots. 

Made by

Samuel Tardif

Simon Guevara-Ponce 

Kevin Ghannoum 

Sheridan Perez Antigua 

Ahmed Haffoudah
